nodes.text: Located on the planet Abregado-rae, Le Yer was a beautiful, manicured coastal region and was known as resort city. It was home to the Triple Nova Casino. A subdivision of Le Yer was Phyrstal Island, reachable primarily by hydrobike, which had attractions like the Lost Loves Casino, the Starlight Theater, and Njinska's Tavern. Le Yer was full of casinos, theaters, and other sources of entertainment, but was not lacking in the basic services such as droid or general repair.
